dict.acceptation: 不断的，持续的；永恒的，始终如一的；坚定；忠实的；
[数]常数，常量；不变的事物；永恒值；

sent.orig: Functional outcome was assessed by the Constant-Murley Score.
sent.trans: 功能的结果评价依据Constant-Murley评分系统。

sent.orig: Constant modulus algorithm (CMA), which was used in blind equalization, is introduced in this paper.
sent.trans: 文中引入了用于盲信号均衡的恒模算法(CMA:constant modulus algorithm)。

sent.orig: Electronic load can be set for constant current, constant resistance and constant voltage operation.
sent.trans: 电子负载可以设置为恒流，恒阻和恒压模式。

sent.orig: The effect of passive decay rate constant? gain coefficient and space surround constant were analyzed.
sent.trans: 分析衰减常数、益系数和空间常数对图像增强处理的影响。

sent.orig: Constant Humidity: AAS can keep constant humidity around the planting area of greenhouses '.
sent.trans: 保湿：AAS开启后可保持温室栽培区内空气湿度的相对稳定。
